name: FUNKYTOWN
description:
You play as a funky fox in the city of Funkytown. However, its residents aren't very happy or funky. If you go out of your way to help them with their troubles, maybe you all can dance together!

Jesse Salinas: Design + Programming

Terry Nguyen: Art + Programming

Mindy Van: Art + Programming

Special thanks to our mentors Travis Williams and Tony Barnes! Tony made the awesome music, and both of them gave fantastic advice on all aspects of game dev. It was a really great learning experience!
